description: This organizer works on local and networked drives. It organizes music into many useful categories. The program is very intuitive and easy to figure out all primary functions such as editing, deleting (from library or file), playing, playlists, multiple playlists... I've just started with the program. There is much more to it. This is an amazing piece of software for the average user. I'd imagine power users and professionals would agree this is an excellent and useful program.
summary: App / program works, is well designed, and is very useful

description:
Couldn't get it to load .aiff audio files

Not inutitive

It has dark mode, I can browse by covers, can use directory structure, there are a few small visualizers, and its overall comfortable to use. Its nowhere near as good as MusicBee but it still does the job pretty well i gotta say, especially compared to the other linux apps ive tried!
summary: Best music app ive found so far

description: Was looking for a nice player able to manage a huge library. This is the Winamp 2 I needed.
does not start lmao
After years of searching, finally round the perfect application for my music library

Awesome! The interface is slick, Polished yet complex enough to manage my music library including cover art, artist picture and more. It's capable of show music by genre and tags and you can search in a single genre. Manages playlist flawlessly and it is also awesome with radio streams. With some of them (the ones who include metadata) it finds the song cover or an artist picture.

This could be an awesome default player for Debian (With KDE desktop) or at least, the only candidate made in QT with such a slick look! If you have Kvantum or is not showing your system style, just disable the dark theme and it will use your theme. Even with Kvantum. It rocks!!
summary: This should be here by default

description:
This is exactly how I want a music player to be. Great Music-Library handling. Feels even better than Winamp on Windows. Tried qmmp and audacious before - they are great but poor or libraty handling. So not useable for me. This saved me from streaming. 
Works without problems for me in Ubuntu 22.04. Thanks a lot!

best music player. i love it. 
lot of music player tested but it is best awerseen.
Title. When I close rythmbox, I have to go to system monitor to actually end the process.
summary: Not as easy to use as Rythmbox, but it closes when you close it

description:
Date: 01-12-2023

Positives first: 
Good sound quality, easy setup, easy to use, nice layout. 

Negative: 
Sadly, the timeline does not work in the playlist. I never know at what timestamp of a track I heard something good and there I cannot rewind to it properly. 

I usually listen to live sets that go for 60-120 minutes and it's hard to guess where the good part has been. Sayonara always shows me the time stamp of when I first started playback. 
So if I jumped to 30:24 and started the track, it stays at 30:24 (despite playing music)  even if it plays music for 30 minutes. 

This would not be a critical issue if I only listened to songs (5-7 minutes)
summary: Minor bug but a deal breaker for me

description:
Not "Goodbye" should be "Hellooo there"
After importing my 65GB .flac music collection it searches with ease. With sortable and customisable columns. The interface is one the best (for a Linux Audio player).
The Album Art import function works really well.
All it needs now is a Song title flash bubble like Audacious; a popUp for the Album art, a more sophisticated equaliser and a windowed 3D Spectrom analyser and it be the leader.
Works perfect with import of libraries stored on a NAS (own Network). Works out of the box with Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. Perfect for me.
summary: Best of all player I tried

description: Great job brothers. Many thanks to you. May Alloh be pleased with it !
Easy to use and lightweight player. It imports from remote file systems just fine. (Many don't)

choisi aprés un test de 16 lecteurs music sous linux
Sayonara est le seul que j'ai trouvé, intégrant les fonctionnalités de réglages de vitesse de lecture et de pitch, 
de ce fait le mieux adaptés à la lecture d'enregistrements et livre audio
summary: fonctionnalites changement vitesse de lecture et Pitch

description: c'est un de mes meilleurs lecteur de musique avec Strawberry
Альтернативы перепробовал все, везде компромиссы, где больше, где меньше. Сайонара удивила, разработчику успехов в развитии замечательного ПО
summary: Отличный плеер! Разработчик понимает, что он делает

description: Дело вкуса конечно... но по мне лучший плейер!
Перебрал кучу приложений в линукс, на винде использовал AIMP. Пока это единственный плеер близкий или такой же по качеству и функционалу к AIMP в линуксе.
有中文界面、均衡器，功能比较全面，体积也小巧。
